price: ߥߊߟߢߌߡߊ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߕߴߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߡߐ߰ ߛߌ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߓߴߏ߬ ߕߊ ߛߙߊ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةٖ تُجۡزَىٰٓ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā li-aḥadin ʿindahu min niʿ'matin tuj'zā
